title: Command Palette
content:
# Command Palette ****
Command Description
`Fiori: Add Configuration for Variants Creation` Adds configuration for variants creation.
`Fiori: Add Deployment Configuration` Adds deployment configuration to the application.
`Fiori: Add Reference to SAP Fiori Apps Reusable Libraries` Helps to reuse a library or component in your SAP Fiori apps by adding a reference to another project. For more information, see [Reuse Library Support](../Project-Functions/reuse-library-support-6e99fbb.md).
`Fiori: Add SAP System` Creates and saves a new SAP system \(ABAP On-Premises or ABAP Environment with a service key\) in VS Code. For more information, see [Managing System Connection](../Project-Functions/managing-system-connection-78a82b6.md).
`Fiori: Add SAP Fiori Launchpad Configuration` Adds the necessary configuration to the application so it can run on SAP Fiori launchpad after deployment.
`Fiori: Add SAP Fiori Launchpad Embedded Configuration` Creates and saves the configuration needed to preview an app within the target environment without the redeployment. For more information, see [Preview an Application on External SAP Fiori Launchpad](../Previewing-an-Application/preview-an-application-on-external-sap-fiori-launchpad-c789692.md).
`Fiori: Archive Project` Archives a project.
`Fiori: Change Telemetry Settings` Allows the user to choose whether telemetry data is sent to SAP for SAP Fiori tools usage. For more information, see [Telemetry](telemetry-837c231.md).
`Fiori: Change the Minimum SAPUI5 Version` Changes the minimum version of SAPUI5 that the application requires.
`Fiori: Delete Application from CAP Project` Deletes an application from a multi-application CAP project. For more information, see [Deleting an Application in CAP Project](../Project-Functions/deleting-an-application-in-cap-project-709f838.md).
`Fiori: Deploy Application` Deploys the application according to the configuration by default stored in `ui5-deploy.yaml`
`Fiori: Enable App-to-App Navigation Preview` Creates and saves the configuration needed to preview the navigation between apps in the same workspace. For more information, see [App-to-App Navigation Preview](../Previewing-an-Application/app-to-app-navigation-preview-543675f.md).
`Fiori: Import SAP System` Imports and saves a new SAP system \(ABAP On-Premise\) in VS Code. For more information, see [Managing System Connection](../Project-Functions/managing-system-connection-78a82b6.md).
`Fiori: Migrate Project for use in SAP Fiori Tools` Moves your SAP Fiori projects from other services, such as SAP Web IDE, to VS Code or SAP Business Application Studio. For more information, see [Migration](migration-70d41f3.md).
`Fiori: Open Annotation File Manager` Launches the annotation file manager.
`Fiori: Open Application Generator` Launches SAP Fiori application generator to create an SAP Fiori application. For more information, see [Generating an Application](../Generating-an-Application/generating-an-application-db44d45.md).
`Fiori: Open Application Info` Opens the Application Information page. For more information, see [Application Information](../Project-Functions/application-information-c3e0989.md).
`Fiori: Open CF Application Router Generator` Generates an app router configuration in the MTA deployment scenario. For more information, see [Generating an MTA Deployment File](../Generating-an-Application/Additional-Configuration/generating-an-mta-deployment-file-9c41152.md).
`Fiori: Open Data Editor` Launches the Data Editor.
`Fiori: Open Environment Check` Checks and creates reports on the development environment.
`Fiori: Open Guided Development` Launches guided development, an extension that implements and updates features and functionality in your project by generating and inserting code snippets based your parameter selections. For more information, see [Use Feature Guides](../Developing-an-Application/use-feature-guides-0c9e518.md).
`Fiori: Open Guided Development to the Side` Launches guided development \(see above\) to the side of the VS Code window.
`Fiori: Open Reusable Library Generator` Launches the reusable library generator.
`Fiori: Open Run Configurations` Opens the run configuration editor to configure preview options for a project. For more information, see [Use Run Control](../Previewing-an-Application/use-run-control-09171c8.md).
`Fiori: Open Service Manager` Launches the Service Manager.
`Fiori: Open Service Modeler` Launches the service modeler, an extension to visualize the OData service model and annotations. For more information, see [Viewing Service Metadata](../Project-Functions/viewing-service-metadata-e369c2c.md).
`Fiori: Open Service Modeler to the Side` Launches the service modeler \(see above\) to the side of the VS Code window.
`Fiori: Preview Application` Allows you to choose a start script to run the application preview.
`Fiori: Refresh Application Modeler View` Refreshes the application modeler view.
`Fiori: Restart XML Annotation Language Server` Restarts the XML annotation language server if it failed.
`Fiori: Run UI5 Linter` Run a static code analysis to validate compliance with SAPUI5 best practices. For more information, see [UI5 linter](https://github.com/SAP/ui5-linter).
`Fiori: Show Output Channel` Opens the Output channel for the application modeler.
`Fiori: Show Page Editor` Opens the Page Editor that shows an outline view of the configurable elements on a selected page. For more information, see [Configure Page Elements](../Developing-an-Application/configure-page-elements-047507c.md).
`Fiori: Show Page Map` Opens the Page Map that shows application pages and navigation paths. For more information, see [Define Application Structure](../Developing-an-Application/define-application-structure-bae38e6.md).
`Fiori: Show Release Notes` Shows the SAP Fiori tools release notes.
`Fiori: Show SAP System Details` Opens the detail view for a saved SAP system in VS Code.
`Fiori tools AI: Show Fiori Tools Joule` Launches Joule, the SAP Fiori tools AI assistant in SAP Business Application Studio, provided you have a subscription to SAP Build Code.
`Fiori: Validate Project` Validates a project.
